tweet_text:
lack of energy, stomach issues, and more.

It's not fun for those affected, and they look back at the drug they were forced to take, look at their current medical issues, and think, "Why the hell would I take yet another new drug where zero long-term studies exist?"

tweet_text:
What's it about?
From a survey which I conducted among my college teachers, every year each teacher submits 50 LoRs on an average. So this process might become a bit tedious for them to keep track of so many LoRs and making sure that the right one is submitted to the University.
